    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a card (yellow or red) that a player receives during a match.
    Card.TypeCard
    Types of cards a player can receive.
    ConsoleTournament
    ConsoleTournament is the user interface for managing a football tournament.
    ControllerTournament
    ControllerTournament handles the main functionality for managing teams, players, and referees within a tournament.
    Fixture
    The Fixture class represents the schedule of matches for a tournament, organized into two groups and including the start date and the list of matches.
    Goal
     
    Goal.GoalRecord
    Defines the type of goal record: goal scorer or assister.
    Group
     
    Match
    The Match class represents a football match between two teams, including the result and date of the match.
    Person
     
    Player
    The Player class represents a football player with attributes such as name, country, dorsal number, and position.
    Player.PositionPlayer
    Enumeration representing the possible positions a player can occupy on the field.
    Referee
    The Referee class represents a referee in a football tournament, including details such as ID, name, country, and type.
    Referee.typeReferee
    Enum representing the type of referee: Central or Assistant.
    Team
    The Team class represents a football team, including its name, country, players, and technical director.
